snippet: The bride is studying for a Ph.D in classical art and archaeology at Princeton; the bridegroom is a lawyer at the New York law firm Wachtell, Lipton, Rosen & Katz.
lead_paragraph: The bride is studying for a Ph.D in classical art and archaeology at Princeton; the bridegroom is a lawyer at the New York law firm Wachtell, Lipton, Rosen & Katz.
